page.title: 12"A DAY IN THE LIFE OF...."
page.content: I wake first,fall downstairs and, just when I think I've escaped,there comes this ominous voice:"How's about a cup of tea?" I scream and die, well, not quite. Afterwards I have a little time to play JetSet Willy. Still not content my family sends me mad by sending my brother to disrupt program loading. When I finally get it to load my divvy brother cries if I don't let him have a go. I'm just about throttle him when down comes Mum for the breakfast. After that I get ready for school and Mum and Dad for work. Maths (ARGH!) then Art (GROOVY!). After school I go home and play on the computer or watch TV (same arguments!) After tea we have gerbil races up and down the stairs. I'm not a good sleeper and don't usually drop off until half-ten. Mum watches TV till Dad returns. So ends another day.
